org.thecosmicfrog.luasataglance.widget

Class StopForecastWidget

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.content.BroadcastReceiver
      • android.appwidget.AppWidgetProvider
        • org.thecosmicfrog.luasataglance.widget.StopForecastWidget

  • public class StopForecastWidget
extends android.appwidget.AppWidgetProvider
    Implementation of App Widget functionality. App Widget Configuration implemented in StopForecastWidgetConfigureActivity

      • prepareLoadStopForecast

        private void prepareLoadStopForecast(@NonNull
                                     android.content.Context context,
                                     android.appwidget.AppWidgetManager appWidgetManager,
                                     int[] appWidgetsIds,
                                     android.widget.RemoteViews remoteViews,
                                     int indexNextStopToLoad)
        If we have a list of selected stops, get the next one we need to load, save it to local storage, then fire up the service.
        Parameters:
        context - Context.
        appWidgetManager - AppWidgetManager.
        appWidgetsIds - Array of all widget IDs.
        remoteViews - RemoteViews object to prepare loading of stop forecast for.
        indexNextStopToLoad - Index of next stop to load.

        private void clearStopForecast(android.widget.RemoteViews remoteViewToClear)

      • stopForecastTimeout

        private void stopForecastTimeout(android.appwidget.AppWidgetManager appWidgetManager,
                                 int appWidgetId,
                                 android.widget.RemoteViews remoteViews,
                                 int timeoutTimeMillis)
        Set up timeout for stop forecast, which clears the stop forecast and displays a holding message after a set period. This is a necessary evil due to their currently being no way for a widget to know when it is "active" or "visible to the user". This implementation is in order to not hammer the battery and network.
        Parameters:
        appWidgetManager - AppWidgetManager.
        appWidgetId - App widget ID.
        remoteViews - RemoteViews.
        timeoutTimeMillis - The period (ms) after which the stop forecast should be considered expired and cleared.
